sentences.en: Awaking alive and well, she assumes the whole affair to have been a grisly nightmare.
sentences.cn: 在醒来以后,她发现自己还活着好好的, 所以克莱儿认为这应该只是个可怕的恶梦.

sentences.en: But everybody was talking, and intent upon the grisly spectacle before them.
sentences.cn: 可是大家都在谈话, 一心关注的是眼前的这个惨状.

sentences.en: Everybody watches much the same grisly footage.
sentences.cn: 每个人都可以观察到他们相似的、恐怖的地方.

sentences.en: EXMP: Houses were dark and grisly under the blank, cold sky.
sentences.cn: 在空寂寒冷的天空下, 房屋显得模糊而恐怖.

sentences.en: He didn't slaughter the cow until he had finished his grisly feast.
sentences.cn: 把他那道可怕的菜吃完,他才杀掉那头牛.

sentences.en: If anybody spoke of that grisly matter, I was all ears in a moment.
sentences.cn: 如果谁谈起那件可怕的事情, 我马上就会聚精会神地听起来.

sentences.en: The bodies were left near Istanbul, giving police ( see picture ) a grisly forensic task.
sentences.cn: 尸体被抛在伊斯坦布尔市郊,现场惨不忍睹, 警方的尸检工作十分沉重.

sentences.en: The girls screamed when the grisly remains of the half - eaten corpses on the screen were shown.
sentences.cn: 当屏幕上显示出尸体被吃掉一半的恐怖残骸时,女孩子们尖叫起来.

sentences.en: The sheriff is investigating a grisly murder.
sentences.cn: 探长在调查一起令人发指的谋杀案.

trans.tran_cn: 可怕的，厉害的，严重的，〈口〉讨厌的
trans.tran_en: extremely unpleasant and involving people being killed or injured
